short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension, config font style

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension uses Chrome's 'Local Font Access API' to change fonts and font sizes on web pages. You can set global fonts and font sizes, or configure them for specific websites.

Chrome version should >= 103
